wyvern.target.corewyvernIL.support

Class GenUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • wyvern.target.corewyvernIL.support.GenUtil

  • public class GenUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Expression doGenModuleIL(GenContext ctx, GenContext origCtx, java.util.Iterator<? extends TypedAST> ai, boolean isModule)
      Generate Wyvern IL Expression by a Wyvern Module System iterator inside a module.
      static GenContext link(GenContext genCtx, Declaration decl)
      Linking of single modules
      for a simple module: It is a value declaration, simply add the value into the context
      for a resource module: It is a method declaration, wrap it into an object, add the object into the context
      for a type declaration: It is a type declaration, add a new variable that has the same name as the type into the context

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GenUtil

        public GenUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • doGenModuleIL

        public static Expression doGenModuleIL(GenContext ctx,
                                       GenContext origCtx,
                                       java.util.Iterator<? extends TypedAST> ai,
                                       boolean isModule)
        Generate Wyvern IL Expression by a Wyvern Module System iterator inside a module.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context before generate
        ai - the iterator of a Wyvern Module System declaration
        Returns:
        the generated IL Expression
        See Also:
        for a valdeclaration v = e: wrap it into let v = e in rest
        for a method or type declaration d: wrap it into an object y, and translate to wrap let y = new { d to IL declaration } in rest, adding mapping f->y.f or T->y.T into context
        for an expression e: wrap it into let y (new name) = e in rest
        while generating comes to the end (empty iterator) generate an IL declaration list for all mapping inside the context, create a new object to wrap the declaration list.

      • link

        public static GenContext link(GenContext genCtx,
                              Declaration decl)
        Linking of single modules
        for a simple module: It is a value declaration, simply add the value into the context
        for a resource module: It is a method declaration, wrap it into an object, add the object into the context
        for a type declaration: It is a type declaration, add a new variable that has the same name as the type into the context
        Parameters:
        genCtx - origin context
        decl - the IL Declaration generated by top level generation
        Returns:
        new context
